message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this product. I think you'll really like it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. However, $90 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer you the product for $110. What do you think?
I understand that $110 is a bit higher than I was hoping to pay, but I'm still interested in the product. Would you be willing to go down to $100?
I can see you're a serious buyer, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $105, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $105 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to go down to $98?
